title: Eternal Moon
description: They are destined to be together for all eternity - if they can defeat the evil stalking them. Determined to stop a madman, P.I. Renata Cordona is undercover when she's almost attacked by a pack of vicious dogs. A lone wolf saves her. Then, out of nowhere, a man with an electrifying touch appears - the man who is clearly her destiny.
author: Rebecca York
